frontmatter.title: Families and Tech Companies
frontmatter.description: I’ve just finished reading Disrupted by Dan Lyons. Apart from finding it hilarious, which I did, it offers a somewhat scathing critique of how a modern technology company operates.

frontmatter.title: It’s time to get rid of traditional release notes
frontmatter.description: Bug fixes and various improvments. I'm willing to bet that almost every app update installed on your device in the last 12 months has had that exact set of release notes, or something extremely similar.
